title: New national song ‘Shaheen’ released by PAF
content:
LAHORE, Sep 07 (APP): On the occasion of Defense Day, the Pakistan Air Force has released a new national song, “Shaheen”.
The song began with the heart-warming words of “Yeh Ghazi, Yeh Tere Pur Asrar Bande”. The song pays tribute to the Pakistan Air Force, the protector of the air borders. The song, sung by renowned singer Shuja Haider, is a great story of the solidarity of the Pakistan Air Force and unparalleled loyalty to the homeland.
The song beautifully depicts the professional capabilities of the Pakistan Air Force, while the song vows to make sacrifices for the homeland and keep moving forward.
The song contains a charming combination of bravery, sacrifice and the dignity of the homeland, highlighting the courageous role of the Pakistan Air Force, the guardian of the skies.
The new national song released by the Pakistan Air Force on the occasion of Defense Day is an embodiment of sacrifice and renewal of the pledge of loyalty.
